ARABIC: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'When will this promise be fulfilled if you are telling the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet they say: "When will this promise come to pass? (Tell Us) if you speak the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They also say: "Tell us when this threat will come to pass, if you are truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They ask, "When the Day of Judgment will come, if it is true at all?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “When will this promise come, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "When this promise, if you are truthful"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: When will this threat come to pass, if you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'When shall this promise come to pass, if you speak the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: When (will) this promise (be fulfilled), if ye are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They ask, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if what you say be true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: when will this Promise be fufilled if ye say sooth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They also say: "When will this promise (come to pass)? (Say) if ye are truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they (the disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah) say: "When (will) this promise (be fulfilled), if you are truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they ask: 'When will this promise come, if what you say is true'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “When is this promise, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:71] And they say, ‘When will this promise, of chastisement, be, if you are truthful?’, regarding it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say: When (will) this promise (be fulfilled)) when will come this promise that you so often promised us, (if ye are truthful) that the torment is coming?
